name: What's Next? (AZAR Majed)
description:
What will the dice change🎲? Player🏃‍♂️? Enemies👾? Powerups💊? Attacks🔫? EVERYTHING can change!

In this Top-down shooter, you control a random Player fighting random Enemies with random Powerups and Attacks. The goal is to survive as many Waves as possible by killing all Enemies and Bosses present in each. 🪖

For the Player, Enemies, and Bosses, the sprite, color, movement speed, attack power, defense power, and ability are randomly shuffled. Specifically for Enemies and Bosses, possible movement patterns are also meant to be specific to each. 💫

HoW lOnG cAn YoU lAsT??? 😈

Controls

Move 🏃‍♂️ - WASD 

Aim 🎯  - Mouse

Attack 💥  - Mouse Click
